DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial conduct compare drug sertraline cognitive behavioral therapy symptom depression , antiepileptic medication compliance , seizure frequency , quality life outcome person depression seizure disorder epilepsy . Approximately 140 person enrol study period five year . Individual participation last approximately 16 week . Study participant choose randomly receive either study medication ( sertraline ) cognitive behavior therapy 16 week . Sertraline approve Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) . Subjects receive cognitive behavior therapy provide one-hour individual session license clinical psychologist week 15 week . All study participant attend schedule clinic visit every 4 week 16 week .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION : Must seizure disorder . Must meet DSMIV criterion major depression . Must willing provide write informed consent . Must age 21 75 year old . Must compliant , cooperative , reliable , able follow instruction , visit clinic schedule . EXCLUSION : Have active suicidal homicidal ideation . Have current alcohol substance abuse disorder history bipolar depression psychotic disorder . Are pregnant lactating . Are known hypersensitive sertraline . Have progressive central nervous system disorder ( tumor multiple sclerosis ) , severe hepatic renal disease ( serum creatinine > 3 mg/dl ) . Currently take antidepressant medication see therapist regularly .
